cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)

set(TP_MODULE_PUBLIC_PATHS)
set(TP_MODULE_PRIVATE_PATHS)

set(THIRDPARTY_PUBLIC_PATHS)
set(THIRDPARTY_PRIVATE_PATHS)

set(BAMBO_ENGINE_TP_MODULES 
GLAD
GLFW
STBI
GLM
OpenAL
NLJson)

foreach(TP_MODULE ${BAMBO_ENGINE_TP_MODULES})

	add_subdirectory(${TP_MODULE})

	list(APPEND THIRDPARTY_PUBLIC_PATHS ${TP_MODULE_PUBLIC_PATHS})
	list(APPEND THIRDPARTY_PRIVATE_PATHS ${TP_MODULE_PRIVATE_PATHS})

endforeach()

set(BAMBO_ENGINE_THIRDPARTY_PUBLIC_PATHS ${THIRDPARTY_PUBLIC_PATHS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(BAMBO_ENGINE_THIRDPARTY_PRIVATE_PATHS ${THIRDPARTY_PRIVATE_PATHS} PARENT_SCOPE)
